nodes.text: This V-series droid supervisor was stationed at Imperial Relay Outpost V-798 on the planet Vaal, in the Gordian Reach.

In 0 ABY, shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the commanding officer of the relay station on Vaal, sergeant Reybn, was using the droid as a means to protect his face while sunbathing. Another soldier, Privitt, remarked that it was illegal to use droids in that way.
